title: Todo List App
description:
Build a functional todo list app combining lists, state, and navigation.

## Requirements

1. Create a `TodoItem` struct that is `Identifiable`:
   - `id: UUID`
   - `title: String`
   - `isCompleted: Bool`

2. Create a `TodoListView` with:
   - `@State` array of TodoItems
   - `@State` property for new item text
   - A TextField to enter new todos
   - A List displaying all todos
   - Ability to toggle completion status
   - Swipe to delete items

3. Features:
   - Tapping a row toggles its completed status
   - Completed items show a checkmark
   - Swiping left reveals a delete button
   - Pressing return in TextField adds new item

4. Wrap in NavigationStack with title "My Tasks"

## Expected Behavior

- User can add new todos
- User can mark todos as complete/incomplete
- User can delete todos by swiping
- List updates immediately on changes
